title: image3.png
description:
This image is a screenshot of a user interface, RETROARCH, with a PlayStation-like theme. The background is a solid blue color.

On the left side of the screen, there is a vertical list of menu options, represented by icons. The second option, a PlayStation controller icon, is highlighted. To the right of the controller icon, a list of game titles is shown, with "Azumanga Donjara Daiou (Japan)" highlighted. Other titles visible are "Crash Bandicoot - Warped (USA)," "Silent Hill (Japan) (Rev 1)," "Touge Max G (Japan)," and "World Soccer Winning Eleven 2002 (Japan)."

On the bottom left, the text "1.20.0 - Beetle PSX HW (0.9.44.1 8b27054)" is displayed, which appears to be version information for the emulator software.

On the right side of the screen, a large game cover art is visible for the highlighted game, "Azumanga Donjara Daiou." The cover features several anime-style cartoon characters. The top right corner of the screen shows the date and time "23-07 13:47" and a battery icon with "100%" next to it. The top of the entire desktop has a separate status bar with more icons.
